p: It is worth mentioning that the HPLC results under study agreed quite well with the data of Farag et al. [ 23] who illustrated that pomegranate crude peels juice contained protocatechuic and gallic acid as major constituents while the polyphenol compounds: chlorogenic, caffeic and ferulic acids, catechin, coumarins, vanillic, caffeine and catechol were found as minor substances.
